NOTES: Used for what someone/something is: jobs, roles, types, nationality (ผมเป็นครู = I am a teacher)
Used for location or ongoing state (ผมอยู่บ้าน = I am at home; ยังอยู่ = still around)
Used for definitions/explanations or focus (สิ่งนี้คืออะไร = what is this?; เขาคือใคร = who is he?)
Very common word meaning “person”; also used as the classifier for people (e.g. 3 people = สามคน)
